members.name: focus
members.descriptionHtml: Sets focus to the spin button.

members.name: value
members.descriptionHtml: The value of the SpinButton. Use this if you intend to pass in a new value as a result of onChange events. This value is mutually exclusive to defaultValue. Use one or the other.

members.name: ariaDescribedBy
members.descriptionHtml: Optional prop to add a string id that can be referenced inside the aria-describedby attribute

members.name: ariaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: A description of the SpinButton for the benefit of screen readers.

members.name: ariaPositionInSet
members.descriptionHtml: The position in the parent set (if in a set) for aria-posinset.

members.name: ariaSetSize
members.descriptionHtml: The total size of the parent set (if in a set) for aria-setsize.

members.name: ariaValueNow
members.descriptionHtml: Sets the aria-valuenow of the spin button. The component must be controlled by the creator who controls the value externally. ariaValueNow would be the numeric form of value.

members.name: className
members.descriptionHtml: Optional className for SpinButton.

members.name: componentRef
members.descriptionHtml: Gets the component ref.

members.name: decrementButtonAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Accessibile label text for the decrement button for the benefit of the screen reader.

members.name: decrementButtonIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Icon for the decrement button of the spinButton

members.name: defaultValue
members.descriptionHtml: The initial value of the SpinButton. Use this if you intend for the SpinButton to be an uncontrolled component. This value is mutually exclusive to value. Use one or the other.

members.name: disabled
members.descriptionHtml: Whether or not the SpinButton is disabled.

members.name: downArrowButtonStyles
members.descriptionHtml:
Custom styles for the downArrow button.

Note: The buttons are in a checked state when arrow keys are used to incremenent/decrement the spinButton. Use rootChecked instead of rootPressed for styling when that is the case.

members.name: getClassNames
members.descriptionHtml: Custom function for providing the classNames for the spinbutton. Can be used to provide all styles for the component instead of applying them on top of the default styles.

members.name: iconProps
members.descriptionHtml: Icon that goes along with the label for the whole SpinButton

members.name: incrementButtonAriaLabel
members.descriptionHtml: Accessibile label text for the increment button for the benefit of the screen reader.

members.name: incrementButtonIcon
members.descriptionHtml: Icon for the increment button of the spinButton

members.name: keytipProps
members.descriptionHtml: Optional keytip for this spin button

members.name: label
members.descriptionHtml: Descriptive label for the SpinButton.

members.name: max
members.descriptionHtml: The max value of the SpinButton.

members.name: min
members.descriptionHtml: The min value of the SpinButton.

members.name: onBlur
members.descriptionHtml: A callback for when the user moves the focus away from the picker

members.name: onDecrement
members.descriptionHtml: This callback is triggered when the decrement button is pressed or if the user presses down arrow with focus on the input of the spinButton

members.name: onFocus
members.descriptionHtml: A callback for when the user put focus on the picker

members.name: onIncrement
members.descriptionHtml: This callback is triggered when the increment button is pressed or if the user presses up arrow with focus on the input of the spinButton

members.name: onValidate
members.descriptionHtml: This callback is triggered when the value inside the SpinButton should be validated.

members.name: precision
members.descriptionHtml: To how many decimal places the value should be rounded to. The default value is calculated based on the precision of step. IE: if step = 1, precision = 0. step = 0.0089, precision = 4. step = 300, precision = 2. step = 23.00, precision = 2.

members.name: step
members.descriptionHtml: The difference between the two adjacent values of the SpinButton. This value is sued to calculate the precision of the input if no precision is given. The precision calculated this way will always be \>= 0.

members.name: styles
members.descriptionHtml: Custom styling for individual elements within the button DOM.

members.name: theme
members.descriptionHtml: Theme provided by HOC.

members.name: title
members.descriptionHtml: A title for the SpinButton used for a more descriptive name that's also visible on its tooltip.

members.name: upArrowButtonStyles
members.descriptionHtml:
Custom styles for the upArrow button.

Note: The buttons are in a checked state when arrow keys are used to incremenent/decrement the spinButton. Use rootChecked instead of rootPressed for styling when that is the case.

members.name: value
members.descriptionHtml: The value of the SpinButton. Use this if you intend to pass in a new value as a result of onChange events. This value is mutually exclusive to defaultValue. Use one or the other.

members.name: arrowButtonsContainer
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the arrowButtonsContainer

members.name: arrowButtonsContainerDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for the arrowButtonsContainer when spin button is disabled.

members.name: icon
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the icon.

members.name: iconDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the icon.

members.name: input
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the input.

members.name: inputDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override when spinButton is disabled.

members.name: inputTextSelected
members.descriptionHtml: Style override for ::selection

members.name: label
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the label text

members.name: labelDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the label text

members.name: labelWrapper
members.descriptionHtml: Style for the label wrapper element of the component The label wrapper contains the icon and the label.

members.name: labelWrapperBottom
members.descriptionHtml: Style override when the label is positioned at the bottom.

members.name: labelWrapperEnd
members.descriptionHtml: Style override when the label is positioned at the end.

members.name: labelWrapperStart
members.descriptionHtml: Style override when the label is positioned at the start.

members.name: labelWrapperTop
members.descriptionHtml: Style override when the label is positioned at the top.

members.name: root
members.descriptionHtml: Styles for the root of the spin button component.

members.name: spinButtonWrapper
members.descriptionHtml: Style for spinButtonWrapper when enabled.

members.name: spinButtonWrapperDisabled
members.descriptionHtml: Style override when spinButton is disabled.

members.name: spinButtonWrapperFocused
members.descriptionHtml: Style override when spinButton is enabled/focused.

members.name: spinButtonWrapperHovered
members.descriptionHtml: Style override when spinButton is enabled/hovered.

members.name: spinButtonWrapperTopBottom
members.descriptionHtml: Style override when label is positioned at the top/bottom.
